scripts.prepare-mainnet: node prepare-governor-contract.js && node prepare-stakehub.js && node prepare-timelock-contract.js
scripts.prepare-unitest: node prepare-governor-contract.js --mock true && node prepare-stakehub.js --mock true && node prepare-timelock-contract.js --mock true
scripts.migrate: npm run prepare-unitest && truffle migrate &&  npm run prepare-mainnet
scripts.test: npm run prepare-unitest && truffle test && npm run prepare-mainnet
scripts.coverage: npm run prepare-unitest && truffle run coverage --network development &&  npm run prepare-mainnet
scripts.flatten: npm run prepare-mainnet && truffle-flattener contracts/CommunityTaxVault.sol > flatten/CommunityTaxVault.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/StakeAgentProxyAdminMgr.sol > flatten/StakeAgentProxyAdminMgr.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/farm/FarmingCenter.sol > flatten/FarmingCenter.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/farm/FarmRewardLock.sol > flatten/FarmRewardLock.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/StakeHubUpgradeableProxy.sol > flatten/StakeHubUpgradeableProxy.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/governance/Timelock.sol > flatten/Timelock.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/governance/Governor.sol > flatten/Governor.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/rHT.sol > flatten/rHT.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/KWI.sol > flatten/KWI.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/StakeHubImpl.sol > flatten/StakeHubImpl.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/StakeAgentUpgradeableProxy.sol > flatten/StakeAgentUpgradeableProxy.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/StakeAgentImpl.sol > flatten/StakeAgent.sol
